Class.name: ompare.ReportType.Base
Class.Description:

License MIT
Source: https://github.com/alexatwoodhead/ompare
Version: 1.0
Serverside component for reporting Does NOT need to be deploying to target servers for profiling source signatures and optional capturing source detail Extensible configuration and processing for ReportTypes eg: Class, Lookup, Mapping, Routine, SQL

Parameter.name: DocumentType
Parameter.Description: Ensure this Code doesn't collide with other sub-class implementations of Base Eg: "cls" abbreviation for class

Method.name: CreateDynamicReport
Method.Description: Called from ompare.Report.Defintion on subclass on ompare.ReportType.Base Override in subclass

Method.name: IsDynamicReportType
Method.Description: Override to return true if the document type is managed by subclass

Method.name: PopulateReportParams
Method.Description: Called from ompare.Report.Defintion on subclass on ompare.ReportType.Base Override in subclass

Method.name: GetDateTimeOfData
Method.Implementation: Quit:env="" "" set date=+$P($G(^ompare("Data",env)),"^") Quit:date=0 "" set time=+$P($G(^ompare("Data",env)),"^",2) Quit:time=0 "" Quit $ZDT(date_","_time,3)

Method.name: ReportDetailAltText
Method.Implementation:
// ^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname,toEnv,toNs) set return="" set out="" quit:type="" "type is empty" quit:name="" "name is empty" quit:env="" "env is empty"
set sec=0 set subname="" set subtype="" for { set subtype=$O(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype)) quit:subtype=""
for { set subname=$Order(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname)) quit:subname=""
set ns=$Order(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname,env,""),+1,result) continue:ns=""
set next=$I(out(subtype)) set out(subtype,next,"name")=subname set out(subtype,next,"result")=result } } quit ..DrawDetailAltText(.out, return, eol)

Method.name: ReportDetailAltTextWithLink
Method.Implementation:
set return="" set out="" quit:type="" "type is empty" quit:name="" "name is empty" quit:env="" "env is empty"
set sec=0 set subname="" if $Data(^||ReportData(type,name,"d"))=0 { W "(",..AddSourceLink(..RTPEnumToText(..#RPTDifferent),.lnk,result),")" Quit "" } set subtype="" for { set subtype=$O(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype)) quit:subtype=""
for { set subname=$Order(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname)) quit:subname=""
set ns=$Order(^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname,env,""),+1,result) continue:ns=""
set next=$I(out(subtype)) set out(subtype,next,"name")=subname set out(subtype,next,"result")=result } } // Pass on to ReportType specific implementation do ..DrawDetailAltTextWithLink(.out, return,.lnk,eol,displayComments) quit ""

Method.name: DisplayComment
Method.Implementation:
set sfEnv=$G(lnk("sfEnv")) set sfNS=$G(lnk("sfNS")) set sfST=$G(lnk("sfST")) set sfSTN=$G(lnk("sfSTN")) set sfT=$G(lnk("sfT")) set sfTN=$G(lnk("sfTN")) set stEnv=$G(lnk("stEnv")) set stNS=$G(lnk("stNS")) set stST=$G(lnk("stST")) set stSTN=$G(lnk("stSTN")) set stT=$G(lnk("stT")) set stTN=$G(lnk("stTN")) set T=$S($L(sfT):sfT,1:stT) set TN=$S($L(sfTN):sfTN,1:stTN) set ST=$S($L(sfST):sfST,1:stST) set STN=$S($L(sfSTN):sfSTN,1:stSTN) if $L(sfEnv),$L(sfNS),$L(stEnv),$L(stNS),$L(T),$L(TN),$L(ST),$L(STN) { set comment=$G(^ompare("DIFFCOMMENT",sfEnv,sfNS,stEnv,stNS,T,TN,ST,STN)) W:$L(comment) "
",$ZCVT(comment,"O","HTML"),"
" }

Method.name: AddSourceLink
Method.Implementation: W "",label,"" Quit ""

Method.name: DrawExcelReportSection
Method.Description: Add new sections to generated Excel Report projection Subclass in ompare.ReportType.[ViewName]
